comment._content: One of the most innovative and creatively restless drummers ever - a huge talent.

comment.author: 52682399@N07
comment._content:
Taken at the Parker Quintet's New York opening at the Deuces on Thursday, August 7, 1947.
("Parker playing at the Deuces," Down Beat, Aug. 27, 1947, 18.)
(“Slam Stewart and Yardbird Parker Put 52nd Street Back in the Awing Groove,” Chicago Defender, August 16, 1947, 10).
